xwikidoc.name: BlogEditArticle
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: #** * Blog Create or Edit Article Code * **# ## ## Actual Page Display #if($request.page) ## This is the save part #blog_savearticle() #else #if($doc.web.startsWith("Blog_") || ("$!request.editArticle" != "" && $request.editArticle.startsWith("Blog_")) || ("$!request.space" != "" && $request.space.startsWith("Blog_"))) ## { #mycurriki_pageheader("blog" "") #mycurriki_pagecontentheader("blog" "") #blog_editarticle(1) #mycurriki_pagefooter("") #else #blog_editarticle(0) #end #end
